title: Change mipsel-musl to soft float

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

body:
It was [pointed out](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/34910#issuecomment-233694689) by @japaric that the mipsel-musl toolchain should use soft float like the mips-musl toolchain as almost all devices it targets all have soft float. Changing this will require a few pieces:
- [x] Change the [linux-cross docker image](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-buildbot/blob/master/slaves/linux-cross/Dockerfile) in how it builds the [mipsel-linux-musl toolchain](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-buildbot/blob/0a0b6d681789d8fabdfac023177ef863ae946f1b/slaves/linux-cross/Dockerfile#L84) by [following the instructions](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-buildbot/blob/master/slaves/linux-cross/README.md) to regenerate the [config file](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-buildbot/blob/master/slaves/linux-cross/mipsel-linux-musl.config). (anyone can do this, feel free to send a PR) - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-buildbot/pull/108
- [x] Publish a new linux-cross docker image (I can do this)
- [x] Restart buildbot to pick up the new linux-cross docker image (I can do this)
- [ ] Send a PR to add `+soft-float` to the target-features of [the mipsel-musl target spec](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/27e766d7bc84be992c8ddef710affc92ef4a0adf/src/librustc_back/target/mipsel_unknown_linux_musl.rs#L25), like the [mips-musl target spec](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/27e766d7bc84be992c8ddef710affc92ef4a0adf/src/librustc_back/target/mips_unknown_linux_musl.rs#L25)

I'm gonna tag this as E-easy as it's pretty clear how to proceed, and I can help out anyone willing to do so! You even get to play around with our infrastructure a bit :)
